selector.label: Language
selector.description: Select your preferred language for the Plexcord.

location.label: Settings Location
location.description: Where to put the Plexcord settings section

winNativeTitleBar.label: Use Windows' native title bar instead of Discord's custom one

transparent.label: Enable window transparency
transparent.description: You need a theme that supports transparency or this will do nothing. WILL STOP THE WINDOW FROM BEING RESIZABLE!! Requires a full restart

winCtrlQ.label: Register Ctrl+Q as shortcut to close Discord (Alternative to Alt+F4)

donations.title: Donations
donations.subtitle: Thank you for donating!
donations.description: You can manage your perks at any time by messaging @mutanplex.

supportProject.title: Support the Project
supportProject.description: Please consider supporting the development of Plexcord by donating!

contributions.title: Contributions
contributions.subtitle: Thank you for contributing!
contributions.description: Since you've contributed to Plexcord you now have a cool new badge!

settingsSection.title: Settings
settingsSection.hint: Hint: You can change the position of this settings section in the <link>settings of the Settings plugin</link>!

hintParts.prefix: Hint: You can change the position of this settings section in the

denied.title: Desktop Notification Permission Denied
denied.label: You have denied notification permissions. Desktop notifications will not work!

style.label: Notifications Style
style.description: Some plugins may show notifications to you. These come in two styles:
style.desktopDesc: Native Desktop notifications (like when you get a ping)
style.onlyWhenNotFocused: Only use Desktop notifications when Discord is not focused

timeout.label: Notification Timeout
timeout.description: The amount of time (in seconds) that notifications will stay on screen before automatically disappearing

logLimit.label: Notification Log Limit
logLimit.description: The maximum number of notifications to keep in the log before old ones are removed. Set to {{disable}} to disable the notification log and {{unlimited}} to never automatically remove old notifications

restart.description: Restart now to apply new plugins and their settings
restart.following: The following plugins require a restart:
restart.fully: Some plugins require a restart to fully disable
restart.would: Would you like to restart now?

modal.noContributions: {{userName}} has not made any plugins. They likely {{contributedLink}} in other ways!

infoModal.description: Press the cog wheel or info icon to get more info on a plugin
infoModal.settingsInfo: Plugins with a cog wheel have settings you can modify!

error.infoRender: An error occured while rendering this plugin's custom Info Component

excluded.web: Plextron app and the Web version of Discord

search.noCriteria: No plugins meet the search criteria.

required.title: Required Plugins
required.this: This plugin is required for Plexcord to function.

dangerModal.title: DANGEROUS ACTION
dangerModal.disablePlugins: WARNING: You are about to disable {{pluginCount}} plugins!
dangerModal.enableBack: Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed? You can always enable them back later.
dangerModal.undone: This action cannet be undone. Are you sure?
dangerModal.resetDescription: You are about to reset all settings for {{pluginName}} to their default values.
dangerModal.resetText: If you are certain you want to proceed, click Confirm Reset. Otherwise, click Cancel.

pluginModal.noSettings: There are no settings for this plugin.

description.memberListDecorators: API to add decorators to member list (both in servers and DMs)
description.messageAccessories: API to add accessories to messages
description.messageDecorations: API to add decorations to messages
description.chatInputButtons: API to add buttons to the chat input
description.commands: API required by anything that uses commands
description.contextMenu: API for adding/removing items to/from context menus.
description.dynamicImageModal: Allows you to omit either width or height when opening an image modal
description.messageEvents: API required by anything using message events
description.messagePopover: API to add buttons to message popovers
description.messageUpdater: API for updating and re-rendering messages
description.nicknameIcons: API to add icons to the nickname, in profiles
description.serverList: API required for plugins that modify the server list
description.userSettings: Patches Discord's UserSettings to expose their group and name.

badges.description: API to add badges to users

modal.title: Plexcord Donor
modal.special: This Badge is a special perk for Plexcord Donors
modal.description: Please consider supporting the development of Plexcord by becoming a donor. It would mean a lot!

settings.name: Settings
settings.description: Adds Settings UI and debug info

language.label: Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for Plexcord.

settingsLocation.label: Settings Location
settingsLocation.description: Determines where the Plexcord settings section will be located.

noTrack.name: NoTrack
noTrack.description: Disable Discord's tracking (analytics/'science'), metrics and Sentry crash reporting

disableAnalytics.label: Disable Analytics
disableAnalytics.description: Disable Discord's tracking (analytics/'science'), metrics and Sentry crash reporting

supportHelper.name: Support Helper
supportHelper.description: Helps us provide support to you

outdated.title: Hold on!
outdated.body: You are using an outdated version of Plexcord! Chances are, your issue is already fixed.
outdated.footer: Please first update before asking for support!

button.secondaryConfirm: I know what I'm doing or I can't update

updater.title: Hold on!
updater.body: You are using an externally updated Plexcord version, which we do not provide support for!
updater.footer: Please either switch to an {{officially}}, or contact your package maintainer for support instead.

custom.title: Hold on!
custom.header: You are using a custom build of Plexcord, which we do not provide support for!
custom.body: We only provide support for {{officialBuild}}. Either {{switch}} or figure your issue out yourself.
custom.footer: You will be banned from receiving support if you ignore this rule.

dm.warning: Please do not private message Plexcord plugin developers for support!{{br}}Instead, you can join the {{support}} server and use the Plexcord support channel: {{channel}}

fullPatch.label: Full Patch
fullPatch.description: Paste your full JSON patch here to fill in the fields

error.noMatch: No match found. This module may be lazy loaded?
error.multipleMatch: Multiple matches found. Please use a more specific search pattern.

cheatSheet.title: Cheat Sheet
cheatSheet.identifiers: Special regex escape sequence that matches identifiers (varnames, classnames, etc.)
cheatSheet.beforeMatch: Insert the substring before the match
cheatSheet.afterMatch: Insert the substring after the match

replacementEval.label: Treat as Function
replacementEval.description: 'replacement' will be evaled if this is toggled

sync.title: Backup & Restore
sync.warningText: Importing a settings file will overwrite your current settings.
sync.description: You can import and export your Plexcord settings as a JSON file. This allows you to easily transfer your settings to another device, or recover your settings after reinstalling Plexcord or Discord.
sync.successful: Settings successfully imported. Restart to apply changes!

cloud.title: Settings Sync
cloud.description: Sync your settings with the cloud. This allows for easy synchronization across multiple devices with minimal effort.
cloud.updated: Your settings have been updated! Click here to restart to fully apply changes!
cloud.reauth: We've noticed you have cloud integrations enabled in another client! Due to limitations, you will need to re-authenticate to continue using them. Click here to go to the settings page to do so!

error.connect: Cloud sync was disabled because this account isn't connected to the Plexcord Cloud App. You can enable it again by connecting this account in Cloud Settings. (note: it will store your preferences separately)
error.noSettings: There are no settings in the cloud.
error.uptodate: Your settings are up to date.
error.localNewer: Your local settings are newer than the cloud ones.

returned.to: Could not synchronize settings to cloud (API returned {{status}}).
returned.from: Could not synchronize settings from the cloud (API returned {{status}}).

synchronize.to: Could not synchronize settings to cloud ({{error}}).
synchronize.from: Could not synchronize settings from the cloud ({{error}}).

notification.title: Cloud Integration
notification.host: {{host}} has been added to the whitelist. Please restart the app for the changes to take effect.

erase.failed: Failed to erase all data (API {{status}} returned), please contact support.

button.fromDescription: This will overwrite your local settings with the ones on the cloud. Use wisely!

erase.title: Are you sure?
erase.body: Once your data is erased, we cannot recover it. There's no going back!

cloud.overview: Plexcord comes with a cloud integration that adds goodies like settings sync across devices. It {{privacy}}, and the {{source}} is AGPL 3.0 licensed so you can host it yourself.
cloud.authorization: This will request authorization if you have not yet set up cloud integrations.

backend.title: Backend URL
backend.description: Which backend to use when using cloud integrations.

csp.restart: A restart is required to apply this change

blocked.disallowed: Some images, styles, or fonts were blocked because they come from disallowed domains.
blocked.recommended: It is highly recommended to move them to GitHub or Imgur. But you may also allow domains if you fully trust them.
blocked.afterAllow: After allowing a domain, you have to fully close (from tray / task manager) and restart {{platform}} to apply the change.

imgur.direct: Imgur links should be direct links in the form of {{etc}}
imgur.copy: To obtain a direct link, right-click the image and select 'Copy image address'.

wants.detail: Unless you recognise and fully trust {{domain}}, you should cancel this request!
wants.restart: You will have to fully close and restart {{appName}} for the changes to take effect.
wants.content: The following types of content will be allowed to load from {{domain}}:
wants.understand: I fully trust {{domain}} and understand the risks of allowing connections to it.
wants.title: Host Permissions

themes.title: Themes

error.userscript: Themes are not supported on the Userscript!
error.stylus: You can istead install themes with the {{stylus}}!

themes.download: If using the BD site, click on 'Download' and place the downloaded .theme.css file into your themes folder.

external.title: External Themes
external.security: For security reasons, loading resources (styles, fonts, images, ...) from most sites is blocked.
external.host: Make sure all your assets are hosted on GitHub, GitLab, Codeberg, Imgur, Discord or Google Fonts.

advanced.warning: This section is for advanced users. If you are having difficulties using it, use the Local Themes tab instead.
advanced.paste: Paste links to css files here
advanced.prefix: You can prefix lines with @light or @dark to toggle them based on your Discord theme
advanced.direct: Make sure to use direct links to files (raw or github.io)!

updater.title: Updater

github.local: Your local copy has more recent commits. Please stash or reset them.

error.check: Failed to check updates. Check the console for more info
error.title: Oops!
error.tryAgain: An unknown error occurred. Please try again or see the console for more info.
error.command: Command {{path}} not found. Please install it and try again.
error.code: Code {{code}}. See the console for more info.
error.render: Failed to render the {{tab}} tab. If this issue persists, try using the installer to reinstall!
error.failed: That also failed :( Try updating or re-installing with the installer!

updater.click: Click here to view the update

successful.title: Update Success!
successful.body: Successfully updated. Restart now to apply the changes?

automatically.label: Automatically update
automatically.description: Automatically update Plexcord without confirmation prompt

notify.label: Get notified when an automatic update completes
notify.description: Shows a notification when Plexcord automatically updates

error.title: Oh no!
error.render: An error occurred while rendering this Component. More info can be found below and in your console.

componentFailed.message: Uh Oh! Failed to render this Page. However, there is an update available that might fix it. Would you like to update and restart now?

error.execute: An Error occurred while executing command '{{command}}'

log.title: Notification Log
log.permamently: This will permamently remove {{count}} notification{{s}}. This action cannot be undone.

error.render: Failed to render {{key}} Member List Decorator

accountPanelServerProfile.name: AccountPanelServerProfile
accountPanelServerProfile.description: Right click your account panel in the bottom left to view your profile in the current server

prioritize.label: Prioritize Server Profile
prioritize.description: Prioritize Server Profile when left clicking your account panel

allCallTimers.name: AllCallTimers
allCallTimers.description: Shows call timers in all voice calls

showWithoutHover.label: Show Without Hover
showWithoutHover.description: Always show the timer without needing to hover

showRoleColor.label: Show Role Color
showRoleColor.description: Display in the userâ€™s role color (if the ShowRoleColor plugin is enabled)

watchLargeGuilds.label: Watch Large Guilds
watchLargeGuilds.description: Track users in large guilds. This may cause lag if you're in a lot of large guilds with active voice users. Tested with up to 2000 active voice users with no issues.

fixUI.label: UI Fix
fixUI.description: In some cases the timer may break the user interface. Enable this option to fix it.

altKrispSwitch.name: AltKrispSwitch
altKrispSwitch.description: Makes the Noise Suppression Popout switch between None and Krisp instead of Krisp and Standard

alwaysAnimate.name: AlwaysAnimate
alwaysAnimate.description: Animates anything that can be animated
